// Code generated by gs-mock v0.0.6. DO NOT EDIT.
// Source: https://github.com/go-spring/gs-mock
// gs mock

package all_default

import (
	"github.com/go-spring/gs-mock/gsmock"
	"io"
)

// CloserMockImpl is a generated mock implementation of the Closer interface.
// It embeds the original interfaces and provides methods to register mock behaviors.
type CloserMockImpl struct {
	io.Writer

	r *gsmock.Manager
}

// NewCloserMockImpl creates a new mock instance for Closer with the given
// gsmock.Manager and initializes the embedded interfaces.
func NewCloserMockImpl(r *gsmock.Manager) *CloserMockImpl {
	return &CloserMockImpl{r: r}
}

//go:noinline
func (impl *CloserMockImpl) funcClose() func(impl *CloserMockImpl) error {
	return (*CloserMockImpl).Close
}

// Close executes the mocked Close method.
func (impl *CloserMockImpl) Close() error {
	if ret, ok := gsmock.Invoke(impl.r, impl.funcClose(), impl); ok {
		return gsmock.Unbox1[error](ret)
	}
	panic("no mock code matched for CloserMockImpl.Close")
}

// MockClose returns a Mocker11 instance to register mock behavior for Close.
func (impl *CloserMockImpl) MockClose() *gsmock.Mocker11[*CloserMockImpl, error] {
	return gsmock.Mock11(impl.funcClose(), impl.r)
}
